title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 57-3.7 - Exemption
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 57-3.7 - Exemption

State Regulations

An institution that offers a registered program leading
to certification in any of the following classroom teaching titles: students
with disabilities in early childhood, childhood, middle childhood, adolescence, or all grades; speech and language disabilities; deaf and hard of hearing; and
blind and visually impaired, pursuant to section
52.21
of this Title, shall be
deemed approved, pursuant to this Subpart, for purposes of offering course work
or training in autism within such program to students in the
program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
57-3.7

Amended

New

York State Register September 28, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 39, eff. 9/28/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
